Name: csmm-7dtd
Overview: This Docker will install and download CSMM for 7DtD (CatalysmsServerManager).

hostname.Name: Hostname
hostname.Description: Must be in this exact format: 'https://www.server.org' (without quotes, no path or locations allowed only subdomains and with no trailing '/').

steamapikey.Name: Steam API Key
steamapikey.Description: Steam API Key goes here (you can get it from: https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey).

dicordbottoken.Name: Dicord Bot Token
dicordbottoken.Description: Your Discord Bot Token (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

discordclientsecret.Name: Discord Client Secret
discordclientsecret.Description: Your Discord Client Secret (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

discordclientid.Name: Discord Client ID
discordclientid.Description: Your Discord Client ID (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

databasebackupinterval.Name: Database Backup Interval
databasebackupinterval.Description: Specify the database backup interval in seconds (saved to the ../Database/7dtd.sql).

forceupdate.Name: Force Update
forceupdate.Description: Set to 'true' to force an update.

csmmdownloadurl.Name: CSMM Download URL
csmmdownloadurl.Description: Only change if you are know what you are doing.

webport.Name: Web Port
webport.Description: Please note that you should reverse proxy the server trough nginx, apache or any other reverse proxy software to your Hostname as filled in above.

mariadbport.Name: Maria DB Port
mariadbport.Description: Only needed if you want to connect to the database.
